content.title: Rules
content.text:
‚õîÔ∏è PROHIBITED ON THE SERVER:

1.1 ‚Äì Use of cheats (hacks, scripts, trainers), game bugs that give an advantage over other players, as well as use of dupes and texture exploits.
1.2 ‚Äì Condemnation, criticism, misleading statements, deceit, rumor-spreading, threats, insults, or any form of disrespect toward the administration or the project.
1.3 ‚Äì Pretending to be part of the server administration or claiming any affiliation with it.
1.4 ‚Äì Advertising other projects, making public statements about leaving the server, or encouraging others to join a different project.
1.5 ‚Äì Use of offensive language, player insults, mentions of family members or relatives, inciting ethnic hatred, making racist or Nazi statements, or using racist and Nazi symbols.
1.6 ‚Äì Building bases or defensive structures near obelisks, terminals, surface entrances on the Aberration map, or blocking access to Aberration zones on the Valguero map (these will be removed without warning).
1.7 ‚Äì Cluttering the map with abandoned buildings, traps, turrets, or leftover structures after farming. Such structures will be removed without warning. (All spikes, taming pens, etc., must be removed after taming.)
1.8 ‚Äì Excessive global spam around your base.
1.9 ‚Äì Floating/invisible buildings or dinos. These will be removed without investigation.
2.0 ‚Äì Selling any in-game items or services for real money. The server has its own store: https://andor.survivalshop.org/
2.1 ‚Äì Blocking player spawn points with turrets, buildings, or other objects.
2.2 ‚Äì Building in or blocking cave entrances that contain artifacts. Any such structures will be removed without warning.
2.3 ‚Äì Building on boss arenas.
2.4 ‚Äì Building on or blocking loot drops, both underwater and on land.
2.5 ‚Äì Blocking explorer notes (all players must have access to collect them on foot or with a dino).
2.6 ‚Äì Settling in areas that cannot be reached without beds, zip-lines, etc., or are inside map textures.
2.7 ‚Äì Luring or dropping aggressive creatures onto other players' bases.
2.8 ‚Äì Building around beaver dams (will be removed without warning).
2.9 ‚Äì Building too close to other players‚Äô bases without permission.
3.0 ‚Äì Blocking or sealing off oil pumps/gas collectors (will be removed without warning).
3.1 ‚Äì Interfering with taming or stealing creatures that are already in someone else's trap.
3.2 ‚Äì Blocking access to resource-rich areas (crystal, metal, obsidian, etc.). Such structures will be removed without warning.
3.3 ‚Äì Blocking biome passageways, mission terminals, teleporters, or space passages.
3.4 ‚Äì Blocking riverbeds on the map.
3.5 ‚Äì Leaving aggressive dinos outside your base.
3.6 ‚Äì If you‚Äôve claimed an area with scattered structures (foundations/pillars), there must be visible construction progress. Otherwise, these will be removed.
3.7 ‚Äì Tribes may have only one base per map. (A breeding base counts as a second base. You are occupying potential space for other tribes.)
3.7.1 ‚Äì Any structure outside your main base will be considered a second base and may be removed without warning. (Exception: ocean platform at the map edge for aquatic breeding or an open Tek Teleporter.)
3.8 ‚Äì Giving away dinos, items, buildings, or resources. (Penalty: deletion of all dinos/structures of the tribe or a ban ‚Äì for both the giver and the receiver.)
3.9 ‚Äì Dinos can only be sold as neutered.
4.0 ‚Äì Undercutting prices or selling in-game items for disproportionately low prices.
4.1 ‚Äì Leaving dinos with mating enabled in public areas (even same-gender ‚Äì considered a giveaway).
4.2 ‚Äì Being part of different tribes on different maps. The tribe composition must be the same across all maps. (Exception: a solo player on another map who does not invite others.)
4.3 ‚Äì Building on spawn locations of key dinos (e.g., Giganotosaurus, Spinosaurus, Desmodus, etc.).

üí• Turret Damage to Dinos ‚Äì x2
‚õÖÔ∏è Gamma ‚Äì Enabled
üß± Structure Collision ‚Äì Disabled

üß© Auto-Unlock of Core Engrams ‚Äì Disabled

Transfer ‚Äì Fully Open, No Restrictions
